item.title: Pip Modules Names Only Using sed
item.description: Getting Pip Package Names Using sed & pip freeze Upgrading pip packages can be a pain. More so when you’re not using virtual environments but, even with them it’s still annoying.

item.title: A Modern Approach to Link Building for SEO

item.title: Lenovo TrackPad & TrackPoint Fix
item.description: Lenovo Arch TrackPoint & TrackPad Sensitivity Fix For those not following me on Instagram or Twitter I’ve recently made the switch to EndeavourOS (a flavour of Arch Linux) and have been using it as my daily driver.
